Package Resolution_Puzzle

Class PuzzleSolver

java.lang.Object
Resolution_Puzzle.PuzzleSolver
public class PuzzleSolver extends Object
PuzzleSolver résout un puzzle jigsaw sans rotation des pièces. Il détecte automatiquement la largeur (m) et la hauteur (n) en parcourant la première ligne et la première colonne. Le seul paramètre requis est le chemin vers le dossier contenant toutes les images des pièces.

    • getDecalageTop

      public List<Integer> getDecalageTop()

      list of vertical shifts (top edge) for each column

      Returns:
      list of horizontal shifts (left edge) for each row

    • loadAllPieces

      public List<PieceSave> loadAllPieces() throws IOException
      Loads all puzzle pieces from disk and analyzes them.
      Returns:
      list of PieceSave containing analyzed pieces
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during image reading

    • solvePuzzle

      public PuzzleSolver.PuzzleResult solvePuzzle() throws IOException
      Attempts to solve the puzzle and return the result.
      Returns:
      PuzzleResult containing the solved matrix and unplaced pieces
      Throws:
      IOException - if a piece cannot be loaded or analyzed
